thread.section_title: Precision Tax Relief Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Precision Tax Relief | www.precisiontaxrelief.com
thread.title: Kathy Gaul
thread.title_full: Precision Tax Relief reviewed by Kathy Gaul

author: Kathy Gaul
title: Kathy Gaul
text: We were 5 years behind on taxes, Lorraine Johnson, Mark Jefferies amazing individuals who helped us get back on track with Federal and State. A huge undertaking since we had several states to deal with. Stood beside us, answered our questions, helped us in every, and I mean EVERY capacity. Great company, trust all of you completely. Lorraine Johnson, especially, so many questions and phone calls, to include my hysteria on where we were. She calmed us, and was with us literally every single day. Don't know what we would have done without her and this company.
